name: Keith Oates
text: Great people and love visiting for all my corner post.

name: Joshua Andrew
text: Good place to haul out of,good people.

name: Tom Sigg
text: Took about an hour to load. Nice people. Make sure to scale first when you enter.

name: Roman Gutsulyak
text: Great company for pickup!!! Friendly people, fast service.

name: Tandy Young
text: Its a lumber mill

name: monica simpson
text: we don't ever have to wait in line to get ,Jeff Robertson's log hauling truck(015;Filo), unloaded. YES😃😀😘

name: michael spain
text: Great

name: Mike Doyle
text: I have been looking for not just a good Saw Mill, I have been looking for a great one and found it at Bill's. He has tons of wood, he mills and dries all the wood himself. Bill takes all the time you need to make sure you have the right type of wood you want and then will mill it or plan it down to where you need it. Here are a few pictures of his place. I TOTALLY recommend you call him to check his schedule.

name: Ron King
text: Rock solid service and product.  I called Bill from a big box store because of the over inflated prices.  Bill gave advice on the lumber needed for the use and dimensions.  Everything worked out great 👍 thanks Bill

name: TK King
text: This is the nicest, friendliest, most professional man you will ever meet. My daughter is a freshman at Alabama A&M & I wanted to customize her bed risers using 4 pieces of a 4x4. After calling & driving around & paying an astronomical amount of money trying to get them cut & chiseled out here in Memphis, I came across this angel of a man right outside of Huntsville. He was funny. He was quick. He was efficient. Move in day has been most stressful for me but meeting Bill was just what the doctor ordered. He cut the risers down for me & they are perfect under my daughter’s dorm bed. If I ever have another wood project I will be hard pressed to find anyone as awesome as this man right here. You will not be disappointed with his work.

name: Bill Martin
text: I haven't done any business with Bill...yet (hence 4 stars rather than 5).  But he is very pleasant and easy going, and does some beautiful work using really nice wood.  Looking forward to going back.

name: D Boyd
text: Nice guy with good wood for furniture building. He also sells firewood for those willing to pick it up, at good prices!

name: George Droukas (tvtechparts)
text: Great place to buy all kinds of lumber at great prices, will be going back soon.

name: Debbie Kirkland
text: Great variety of wood available. Beautiful live edge, and handmade bowls available.

name: Ryan Smith
text: Bill is an awesome person with wonderful prices. I will be returning as much as possible.

name: Bryan Thornton
text: Bill was a pleasure to do business with! He'll find or make what you need. I'll be back!

name: Gary Harris
text: Bill is my go-to guy for wood to chop and cut up into new and interesting items.  I'd much rather spend my $$ with a neighbor and stand up guy than anyone else.

name: Dan Crawford
text:
Nice guy.
Quick load.
You betcha!!

name: L Ballard/Blunt
text: Great place to get loaded & unloaded those guys on the forklifts don’t play games!!! Thanks for the Excellent Service!!!!!!

name: Shirley Thomas
text: Unloaded very nice got the lumber off in good time Thank you

name: Jeanie Shea
text: I ordered two custom floating shelves for my newly updated kitchen and was very pleased with how they turned out. I was able to select the type of wood, the stain color and a grey wash along with a texture that finished off my shelves. The owner and his side-kick were knowledgeable, helpful and had my shelves ready on time. Be sure to check this place out if looking for a fireplace mantel, beans for your ceiling and lots of other types of wood uses.

name: Tray Wilson
text: Very professional and very nice wood

name: Jessica Wilson
text: I am an employee at River Bottom Pine and take it from me, there is no better place to the best quality hard wood floors and meet the best people. Everyone there not only cares about your business but they care about you as well.

name: Philip Flores
text: The best wood flooring and custom beam mill in the south east! Very friendly beautiful craftsman’s live edge tables. Very nice selection of custom barn doors. Highly recommend! Philip Flores

name: Wesley Meier
text: Amazing company! Great products!

name: Don Larson
text: Awesome

name: Jeremy Rush
text: A very unprofessional place of business would not recommend Anyone if I could give 0 stars I would the hr department is a joke

name: DREW W.
text: The best service I received since I been a driver..AWESOME!

name: Estella coleman
text: Canfor is the company my husband work at

name: alpinotexas
text: Good place , nice people

name: Gregory S Young
text: Where I'm going to retire from!!!plus I'm all about pleasing the people!

name: keep it clean
text: Great loading in and out 15mins

name: Edwin Harmon
text: Great people,   very exceptional people, great communication.

name: Mr. George L. Graham Sr.
text: Great place for quick loading

name: Leordan Carli
text: Good place

name: James Q
text: Don’t waste your time trying to rush to get here. You’ll just sit for hours anyway

name: johnny bigmack13
text: Good place, nice people.

name: Scott Mains
text: Wonderful selection of rough cut and live edge wood. Definitely worth your time to wander through. Super friendly staff!

name: Pinson Patriot
text: Supper nice and very unique furniture.

name: David McMahon
text: I purchased a beautiful desk from Alabama Sawyer and I love it. It's extraordinarily well-designed and constructed, and I will have it for years. Excellent communication with the company as well. Thanks!

name: Stephen Hicks
text: Innovative design sold me on the Sputnik side table.

name: Tommy Boger
text: James and Holly are the best!!! They take the time to help each customer... they are customer service

name: Derick Smith
text: Good family atmosphere.Price are reasonable. Willing to help you with all your needs.

name: jean cochrane
text: James and Holly at Rustic Lodge Works are so amazing to work with.  If you are looking for a unique piece of wood they are definitely our go to place.

name: Micah Chambers
text: James and Holly at Rustic Lodge works are awesome. Their products and services are unmatched in the area and I have always been well pleased with everything purchased here.

name: steven teal
text: Super friendly and helpful!  A+

name: Mike L
text: Recommend getting a quote in writing. Was quoted a much lower price than I actually paid.

resp.text: We hate to hear that you are unhappy! Give us a call so we can make it right! 256-962-6200

name: Leona Neill
text: nice service.

resp.text: We have no idea as to what company you work for so we don't have any idea on why you gave us a 2 star rating.

name: Terry Teague
text: Great

name: Paul Macy
text:
Note the Mill is not associated with the Tree Service since selling off that business many years ago.

Ken and Chris are outstanding and the always have the best product. You’ll find something you want. They mill trees you haul to them for a fraction of the cost of buying lumber elsewhere. Definitely worth the stop-in.

name: Eric Tanner
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff. Excellent prices. If you are looking for cedar, go here instead of the bigger places. Such a gem of an establishment!

name: Cristoval Zaragosa
text: If you need a tarp a load, they don't have a tarping shed that has safety rails to easily climb the load or a tarping machine that does the tarping over the load for you. The process is fast and simple. Loaders adjust the loads quick and get shipping papers at scale out.

name: Dewayne Stewart
text: Only problem is getting in the gate. Gaurd shack workers be out of the shack sometimes .

name: Lil Duck Parker
text: It's an easy job, but the plant is not in good operation, meaning the most of the machinery is raggley! I had two of my fingers crush last year and they had too be cut off! Plant is always down, they can't fix things properly!

name: Harold Jackson
text: Great place

name: Stan W
text: Truckers, there's a place to park your truck on the south side of Wholesale Ave NE to walk up to the office, it's a small sign, easy to miss or drive past, look for the Huntsville Wood sign on the north side of the road, then look right quickly.

name: T World
text: Slow but good people

name: Sir Kalvin Kandie
text: Great place to work!

name: Waylon Maxwell
text: They slow unloading trucks arrived at at 6:30 and didn't get unloaded til 9:45 was the 4th truck there in line.

name: Stephen Gray
text: Great ppl. Friendly atmosphere. Awesome place to work

name: Billy Brown
text: Great place to work for. Caring people. Family strong. I would know? Been helping them produce quality products for 32 years.

name: blaine newton
text: Good place. Good folks..

name: Cary Crook
text: Staff friendly helpful, very clear on loading procedures,  quick in, quick out. Wear your Hard hat and Safety Glasses. Mask in the office and when directly in contact with all during this time. No Glasses No Hat No Lumber

name: Barry McKay
text: Great place to load

name: Steve Semar
text: It was hot.  Kinda smelled like swamp water  I loved it .....money baby.
